author: jacopoc
msg: Fixed some wrong years in the tentative schedule for 13.07 releases; thanks to Ron Wheeler for reporting this issue.

author: jacopoc
msg: First part of the overhaul of ServerHitBin class: now ServerHitBin objects are thread-safe; however the ServerHitBin class isn't because of its static maps (more work is needed in order to fix this).

author: jsc
msg: AOO revision 1617669 from branch AOO410 was voted to be released as Apache OpenOffice 4.1.1
